programmes.show_description: Comply Or Die. In North Carolina, a convenience store worker is killed, part of a pattern of armed robberies. Police race to arrest the robber before he kills again. S8, Ep17
Harold Shipman. Harold Shipman was a much-loved doctor. Millions watched the GP speaking on TV discussing the benefits of care, not knowing he'd already killed dozens of patients. S3, Ep4
The Dangers Of Success. As a prominent family awakens to noises in the night, their worst nightmare ensues when their beloved daughter, Terri Ann McCoy is fatally shot. S5, Ep5
The Great Philby Mob War. Three armed men attack a man and flee the scene. Authorities are unable to identify the assailants but are convinced it was the work of the Mafia. S7, Ep3

Zeus' Battle For Survival. It's touch and go for German shepherd Zeus as the Animal Cops medical team work through the night to remove a collar embedded in his neck. S12, Ep4
Lasting Impressions. No matter how clean a crime scene appears to be, the culprit often leaves something behind. Even a fingerprint or shoe tread can lead to a conviction. S3, Ep3
Dead Wrong. Hiding a body can be tricky - it's sometimes easier to obscure the circumstances of death, turning murder into suicide or blaming it on someone else. S3, Ep4
A closer look at real FBI cases - from murders to robberies - with dramatic re-enactments and interviews with agents and forensic scientists who work in the investigations. S7, Ep14

Bachan Kaur Athwal. In 1998, Bachan Kaur Athwal ordered her daughter-in-law to be strangled to death in an 'honour killing'. The victim's family reveal how her murder affected them. S1, Ep5
Deadly Heist. When an employee at an armoured van company receives a call about a money shipment that did not arrive, an FBI search for the missing van begins. S4, Ep6
Death in the Delta. Shannon Sanderson was abducted after a successful night at the casino and police discovered she had been stalked and attacked for her $5,000 winnings. S4, Ep9
The Price of Greed. Follows the FBI investigation into a robbery in which masked gunmen tied up employees at an armoured truck depot and left with $18.9 million. S5, Ep1

programmes.show_name: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programmes.show_description: We Found Bonnie. A family is torn apart when a mother in Florida goes missing. The case stumps detectives, who believe that only the woman's three-year-old son knows the truth. S1, Ep5

programmes.show_name: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programmes.show_description: No Promise For Tomorrow. A landlord approaches his rental home to inspect a broken window when he hears a baby crying. What he finds inside will haunt two families forever. S2, Ep1

programmes.show_name: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programmes.show_description: In 2005, a woman is reported missing when she fails to show up at a Motley Crue concert. To this day, her friends and family wait for her killer to visit her secret grave. S2, Ep4

programmes.show_name: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programmes.show_description: A Double Life. In rural Missouri, the body of a young woman lies dead on a deserted dirt road only days before her wedding. Police uncover surprising secrets in her fiancé's life. S2, Ep2

programmes.show_name: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programmes.show_description: The Lookout. The brutal murders of two teenage girls at a remote lookout point at first seem random. Police uncover a web of secrets among their network of friends. S2, Ep5

programmes.show_name: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programmes.show_description: Free To Kill Again. When Erika Verdecia goes missing, her family launches their own search for her. What their homegrown investigation uncovers is a tragic trail of bloodshed. S2, Ep12
Steven McDowell. In Baytown, Texas, 37-year-old Crystal McDowell disappears without a trace. Can detectives uncover the mistake that gives her killer away? S5, Ep7
They All Saw His Evil. A divorcée starts a relationship with a seemingly kind father. However, she doesn't see what everyone else sees in her new man - that he is a killer. S10, Ep18
Darren Vickers. Eight-year-old Jamie Lavis was on the bus Darren Vickers was driving before he disappeared. Vickers joined the hunt and spoke on TV - but was hiding an awful truth. S3, Ep5
Black Widow. When a young man with a developmental disability vanishes, his legal guardian frantically searches for him. Police turn to CCTV to find him. S8, Ep18
Michael Lane. Shana Grice was murdered after being stalked by her ex-boyfriend, Michael Lane. He denied involvement, but experts examine police videos to determine the truth. S3, Ep6
End Of Watch. The town of Cleveland, Oklahoma, is shocked when its esteemed Sheriff is shot dead. Law enforcement determines to find justice for their fellow officer. S5, Ep6
The Shootist. A closer look at real FBI cases - from murders to robberies - with dramatic re-enactments and interviews with agents and forensic scientists who work in the investigations. S7, Ep4

Machete Attack. A shocking machete attack on a puppy leaves the medical team fighting to save his life. The Animal Cops embark on the hunt for his attacker. S12, Ep5
Deadly Dealings. Contract killings arose out of the need to establish the perfect alibi, hiring someone can deflect guilt. Forensic science is changing this. S3, Ep5
Electronic Witness. Mobile phones, CCTV and cashpoints can track virtually every human move. We see exactly how this aids murder investigations. S3, Ep7
A closer look at real FBI cases - from murders to robberies - with dramatic re-enactments and interviews with agents and forensic scientists who work in the investigations. S7, Ep16
FBI Files. A closer look at real FBI cases with dramatic re-enactments and interviews with agents and forensic scientists who work in the investigations. S7, Ep18
Rolandas Poskus/Amanda Playle. Barrister Robert Rinder examines the case of Rolandas Poskus, a man who was found dead in a park in Hull, and Amanda Playle, a woman who was stalked. S5, Ep3
Welcome To The Murderhood. 40-year-old Priscilla Strole seeks a fresh start when she and her teenage son move to a small town in California, unaware it will lead to her untimely end. S3, Ep8
Lee Cutler: A Lost Soul. Lee disappeared one morning after leaving a friend. Had he gone into the wilds, or maybe joined the Israeli army? Follow the hunt for this troubled teen. S1, Ep1
The Big Guy. On Valentine's Day, Demetrius Graves is fatally stabbed. Two days later, Bonnie Ross turns up dead. Police learn they shared one fateful connection. S9, Ep14
Thomas Infante. Thomas and Lisa Infante had four children and a volatile marriage. One day Lisa announced she'd met someone else and an argument spiralled out of control. S1, Ep8
Something About Him. Rogelio Morales sweeps Margarita Sanchez Lemus off her feet. Behind Rogelio's winning smile lurks a monster who will soon show his true colours. S10, Ep7
Broken People. When Jeff Silvernail finds his partner dead at home, it appears a burglary gone wrong. But police soon uncover it is, in fact, the ultimate betrayal. S10, Ep8

programmes.show_name: American Detective With Lt Joe Kenda
programmes.show_description: Drugstore Cowboy. To solve the murder of a respected young entrepreneur, Detective Dale Mason must navigate a tangled conspiracy and outwit a band of career criminals. S2, Ep3
Claudia Lawrence/Len Saunders. Robert Rinder examines the case of 35-year-old Claudia Lawrence's disappearance. Plus, an unprovoked attack leaves a man fighting for his life. S5, Ep8
Night Caller. In 2015, 33-year-old Jonathan Cherol is shot dead in his garden. CCTV footage sends detectives on the hunt for a strange woman and a mysterious vehicle. S9, Ep9
Sri Lanka: Death At The Beach. On Christmas Day 2011, an aid worker was on holiday in Sri Lanka when he broke up an altercation in a hotel bar. His selfless act would end in murder. S1, Ep2
The Confession. When a young mum goes missing in Ellesmere Port, the whole community searches for her. After a tip, Police locate the charred suitcase that holds her remains. S1, Ep8
Don't Open The Door. In Texas, on Christmas Eve 2010, a 12-year-old boy vanishes. Police look at those closest to him, but only surveillance footage can reveal the truth. S8, Ep20
